title: Stage 1 Filter Criteria Output v3 (List of Simple Booleans)
description: List of simplified, boolean-focused structured outputs for initial species filtering. Null represents Uncertain/Not Found.

items.title: Single Species Filter Criteria
items.description: Schema for a single species entry.

filter_is_vascular.description: Is the plant determined to be vascular? (True=Yes, False=No, Null=Uncertain/NotFound).

filter_is_quadrat_relevant.description: Is the plant determined to be relevant for a quadrat based on habit/size? (True=Yes, False=No, Null=Uncertain/NotFound).

filter_is_in_sw_europe.description: Is the plant determined to be present in Southwestern Europe? (True=Yes, False=No, Null=Uncertain/NotFound).

filter_is_in_pyrenees_med.description: Is the plant determined to be present in the Pyrenees or Med. Basin? (True=Yes, False=No, Null=Uncertain/NotFound).
